#labels Jboss7.1,Mysql5.1
#Como configurar JBOSS 7.1 + Mysql5.

= Introduction =

Passo a passo para configurar Mysql no Jboss7.1.


= Details =

1 - Criar Pasta mysql em *$JBOSS_HOME/modules/com/*
2 - Criar Pasta main em *$JBOSS_HOME/modules/com/mysql/main*
3 - Copiar o arquivo _mysql-connector-java-5.1.24-bin.jar_ para a pasta *$JBOSS_HOME/modules/com/mysql/main*
4 - Criar o arquivo _module.xml_ dentro da pasta *$JBOSS_HOME/modules/com/mysql/main* com o seguinte conte√∫do:

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
   <module xmlns="urn:jboss:module:1.0" name="com.mysql">
      <resources>
         <resource-root path="mysql-connector-java-5.1.24-bin.jar"/>
      </resources>
      <dependencies>
         <module name="javax.api"/>
         <module name="javax.transaction.api"/>
      </dependencies>
   </module>

5 - Abra o arquivo:  _$JBOSS_HOME/standalone/configuration/standalone.xml_
6 - Procure a tag: *<subsystem xmlns="urn:jboss:domain:datasources:1.0">*
7 - Dentro da TAG de datasource inclua:

<datasource jndi-name="java:jboss/datasources/Base-ProjectDS" pool-name="Base-ProjectDS" enabled="true" use-java-context="true">
   <connection-url>jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/project-db</connection-url>
      <driver>mysql</driver>
      <pool>
         <min-pool-size>20</min-pool-size>
         <max-pool-size>200</max-pool-size>
      </pool>
      <security>
         <user-name>root</user-name>
         <password>root</password>
      </security>
</datasource> 

8 - Dentro da TAG *drivers* inclua:
     <driver name="mysql" module="com.mysql"/>
